subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Sergiy Stakhovsky of Ukraine won his first ATP title, defeating top-seeded Ivan Ljubicic of Croatia, 7-5, 6-4, and becoming the first “lucky loser” to capture a tournament in 17 years. A lucky loser enters the main draw of a tournament from the qualifying field at the last minute because another player is unable to compete.
